Reformats the Rd structure

rd_flatten.Rd

The Rd structure returned by tools::parse_Rd and utils::.getHelpfile() can to nested and is not ideal for translation. rd_flatten "flattens" that structure into a simpler list and rd_unflatten goes back to the original structure.

Usage

rd_flatten(
  Rd,
  untranslatable = c("alias", "name", "keyword", "concept", "usage")
)

rd_unflatten(rd_flat)

Arguments

Rd

a parsed Rd file returned by tools::parse_Rd or utils::.getHelpfile().

untranslatable

character vector of fields that should not be translated.

rd_flat

a flattened Rd file.
